mapper.select: select q.QNA_NO, q.QNA_TITLE, q.QNA_CONTENT, q.QNA_CREATE, q.QNA_CNT, q.USER_ID, c.category_name, q.CATEGORY_NO from qna q join category c on(q.CATEGORY_NO=c.CATEGORY_NO) where user_id= #{loginId}
select c.cart_no, m.user_id, c.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.price, p.image from carts c join members m on(c.user_id=m.user_id) join products p on(c.prod_no=p.prod_no) where m.user_id=#{loginId}

select pay.PAY_NO, pay.PRICE, pay.prod_no, pro.prod_name, pay.pay_date, pay.user_id, pro.pdf, c.category_name, pro.count from payments pay join products pro on(pay.prod_no=pro.prod_no) join category c on(pro.CATEGORY_NO=c.CATEGORY_NO) where pay.user_id=#{loginId}
mapper.update: update members set OUT_TYPE='yes' where user_id=#{loginId}
